title: Oot'N'Aboot
description: A React Native Mobile app which allows users to view events in their chosen location, create a list of favourited events and redirect them to ticket sites.
technologies: JavaScript | React Native | Java | Spring | SQL

title: Wizarding Wiki
description: A Wikipedia-like site used for finding information on spells, exlixirs, ingredients and houses from the Harry Potter Universe.

title: VetClan
description: My first project! A full stack CRUD appplication built for vets to allow them to add, view, edit and delete all pets and their respective owners.
